overview: Among The Bushes  I'm here again, chasing after him like an adorable crazy maniac. He's always sitting in this park, surrounded by the trees, reading a book, cute and charismatic. He's big, tall and handsome. I can't help myself; he makes my feel mischievous in this little green piece of paradise. I'll take him between the trees, I'll make him take off his clothes and I'll fuck him surrounded by leaves, sunlight and dog walkers.
tagline: We Want To Awaken Your Mind. We Want To Inspire You. We Want To Excite You.
title: Tales Of Lust
